issue.title: Occasional test failures on cloud machines

content.raw:
Just  to remember: most failures are present on factory/transport _stress test in the of
[segfault](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-precise-amd64-gpu-vrc/18/console) or [timeout](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-quantal-amd64-gpu-nvidia/8/testReport/junit/%28root%29/transport_stress/test_ran/).

Amazon machine (UTC) syslog display segfaults:
```
Apr 12 11:04:19 ... kernel: [4971086.328929] factory_stress[1922]: segfault at 0 ip 00002ba9ff81d308 sp 00002baaf4e46180 error 4 in libgazebo_sdf_interface.so.1.6.1[2ba9ff7d9000+a4000]
Apr 12 11:12:14 ... kernel: [4971561.426897] transport_stres[3619]: segfault at 0 ip 00002b0a3324ee65 sp 00002b0ac4e536d0 error 4 in libgazebo_transport.so.1.6.1[2b0a331f5000+84000]

Apr 12 15:53:13 ... kernel: [4988420.116886] factory_stress[14806]: segfault at 2aebfffffffa ip 00002aecd0bb5bc3 sp 00002aedb81ff178 error 6 in libstdc++.so.6.0.16[2aecd0b17000+e2000]

```
@nkoenig did someone give them a try outside jenkins in these machines and test are passing?
content.html:
Just to remember: most failures are present on factory/transport _stress test in the of segfault or timeout.

Amazon machine (UTC) syslog display segfaults:

Apr 12 11:04:19 ... kernel: [4971086.328929] factory_stress[1922]: segfault at 0 ip 00002ba9ff81d308 sp 00002baaf4e46180 error 4 in libgazebo_sdf_interface.so.1.6.1[2ba9ff7d9000+a4000]
Apr 12 11:12:14 ... kernel: [4971561.426897] transport_stres[3619]: segfault at 0 ip 00002b0a3324ee65 sp 00002b0ac4e536d0 error 4 in libgazebo_transport.so.1.6.1[2b0a331f5000+84000]

Apr 12 15:53:13 ... kernel: [4988420.116886] factory_stress[14806]: segfault at 2aebfffffffa ip 00002aecd0bb5bc3 sp 00002aedb81ff178 error 6 in libstdc++.so.6.0.16[2aecd0b17000+e2000]

@nkoenig did someone give them a try outside jenkins in these machines and test are passing?
